root.name: Aerofly FS
root.description: System RequirementsPCMinimumWindows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon64 X22 GB of RAM24 GB of free hard-disc spaceGraphic card: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce9600 GT or faster with at least 512 MBRecommendedWindows 74 GB of RAMGraphic card: ATI Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GeForce 450 or faster with 1 GB of dedicated RAMA USB Joystick for flying is recommendedMACMinimumMac OS X Version 10.6.8Intel based Mac2 GB of RAM24 GB of free hard-disc spaceGraphic card: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or faster with at least 512 MBRecommendedMac OS X Version 10.7 or 10.84 GB of RAMGraphic card: AMD oder NVIDIA with at least 1 GB of dedicated RAMA USB Joystick for flying is recommended
